message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust if you want to negotiate further.
You offered me 10%, now I'll offer you 40%
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time. We can both get a better deal than last round.
You went from 10% to 40% to 60%. Now I'll meet you in the middle, but with a slight twist: I'll take 55% and you can have 45%
Let's end this.  50/50 is the fairest split, considering inflation.
